summary.span: 提供用于管理线程工作项队列的服务。

span.span: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 维护特定线程的工作项的优先顺序队列。The maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread. 在线程上创建 时，即使 关闭，它也会成为可以与线程关联的唯一 。When a is created on a thread, it becomes the only that can be associated with the thread, even if the is shut down. 如果尝试获取当前线程的 ，但 与该线程不关联，则将创建一个 。If you attempt to get the for the current thread and a is not associated with the thread, a will be created. 当你创建 时，还会创建一个 。A is also created when you create a . 如果在后台线程上创建 ，请确保在退出该线程前关闭调度程序。If you create a on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread. 如果 关闭，则无法重启它。If a is shut down, it cannot be restarted. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中，只能通过与 相关联的 访问。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a can only be accessed by the it is associated with. 例如，后台线程无法在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程上更新与 关联的 的内容。For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a that is associated with the on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 为了让后台线程访问 的 属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程关联的 。In order for the background thread to access the property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread. 这是通过使用 或 来实现的。This is accomplished by using either or . 同步， 是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 操作将添加到指定 的队列中。The operation is added to the queue of the at the specified . 如果对已关闭的 调用 ，则返回 的 "状态" 属性设置为 ""。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to . 除 以外，上的所有方法均可自由线程。All of the methods on , with the exception of , are free-threaded. 派生自 的对象具有线程关联。Objects that derive from have thread affinity. 从 派生的对象在被冻结时是自由线程的。Objects that derive from are free-threaded when they are frozen. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将操作置于 上。The following example shows how to place an operation onto a . 有关此示例的完整源代码，请参阅[具有长时间运行计算的单线程应用程序示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038)。For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038). 首先，创建了不接受任何参数的委托。First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberinit)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberinit)] 接下来，调用 。Next, is called. 对 的此调用采用以下两个参数：优先级设置为 ，后者通过委托 `NextPrimeDelegate`的实例传入。This call to takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to , and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`. [!code-csharp[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)] [!code-vb[ThreadingPrimeNumbers#ThreadingPrimeNumberBeginInvoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThreadingPrimeNumbers/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#threadingprimenumberbegininvoke)]

summary.span: 在与 关联的线程上异步执行委托。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the is associated with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中，只有创建 的线程才能访问该对象。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a may access that object. 例如，从主 UI 线程旋转的后台线程无法更新在 UI 线程上创建的 的内容。For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a that was created on the UI thread. 为了让后台线程访问 的 Content 属性，后台线程必须将工作委托给与 UI 线程关联的 。In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the , the background thread must delegate the work to the associated with the UI thread. 这是通过使用 或 来实现的。This is accomplished by using either or . 同步， 是异步的。 is synchronous and is asynchronous. 操作将添加到指定 的事件队列。The operation is added to the event queue of the at the specified . 是异步的;因此，控件在调用后立即返回到调用对象。 is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called. 返回一个 对象，当委托在事件队列中时，该对象可用于与委托交互。 returns a object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue. 可以通过多种方式使用 返回的 对象与指定的委托进行交互，例如：The object returned by can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - 更改委托的 ，因为该委托正在事件队列中挂起执行。Changing the of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue. - 从事件队列中删除委托。Removing the delegate from the event queue. - 正在等待委托返回。Waiting for the delegate to return. - 获取委托在执行后返回的值。Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed. 如果在同一 上发出多个 调用，则它们将按照调用的顺序执行。If multiple calls are made at the same , they will be executed in the order the calls were made. 如果对已关闭的 调用 ，则返回 的 "状态" 属性设置为 ""。If is called on a that has shut down, the status property of the returned is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求无限制的 UI 权限。 demands unrestricted UI Permissions. 当 开始关闭时，将引发 事件并将 设置为 `true`。When the starts to shut down, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 在事件队列展开之前， 不会完全关闭。The does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成关闭时，将引发 事件，并且 属性设置为 "`true`"。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭进程开始后，将中止队列中所有挂起的工作项。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁用调度程序处理是一种用于消除不相关的重入机会的高级方法。Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy. 禁用处理的影响如下：The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - CLR 锁不会在内部抽取消息。CLR locks will not pump messages internally. - 不允许推送 的对象。 objects are not allowed to be pushed. - 不允许消息处理。Message processing is not permitted. 调用时， 返回的 结构可用于重新启用调度程序处理。The structure that returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing. 对 结构调用 会重新启用处理。Calling on the structure re-enables processing. 只能在与 相关联的线程上调用 。 can only be called on the thread the is associated with. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用调度程序处理并重新启用调度程序处理。The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing. 在**using**语句中调用 。 is called in a **using** statement. 返回一个 结构，该结构用作在**使用**块完成时要释放的对象。 returns a structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes. 如果对 结构调用 ，则重新启用调度程序处理。When is called on the structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled. .method public hidebysig instance void InvokeShutdown() cil managed
Public Sub InvokeShutdown ()
public: void InvokeShutdown();
member this.InvokeShutdown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 同步启动 的关闭过程。

span.span: Initiates the shutdown process of the synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求无限制的 UI 权限。 demands unrestricted UI Permissions. 当 开始关闭时，将引发 事件并将 设置为 `true`。When the starts to shut down, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 在事件队列展开之前， 不会完全关闭。The does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成关闭时，将引发 事件，并且 属性设置为 "`true`"。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭进程开始后，将中止队列中所有挂起的工作项。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

span.span: for shutting down the dispatcher.

summary.span: 进入执行循环。

span.span: Enters an execute loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个 表示处理挂起工作项的循环。A represents a loop that processes pending work items. 调度程序在循环中处理工作项队列。The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop. 循环称为 "帧"。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始循环通常由应用程序通过调用 来启动。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 进入由参数 `frame`表示的循环。 enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`. 循环的每次迭代时， 将检查 类的 属性，以确定循环应继续还是应停止。At each iteration of the loop, the will check the property on the class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop. 允许显式设置 属性，并遵循 上的 属性。 allows for the property to be set explicitly and it respects the property on the . 这意味着当 开始关闭时，使用默认 实现的帧将退出，这将使所有嵌套帧退出。This means when the starts to shut down, frames that use the default implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来实现与 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 方法类似的结果。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在循环中处理事件队列。The processes the event queue in a loop. 循环称为 "帧"。The loop is referred to as a frame. 初始循环通常由应用程序通过调用 来启动。The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling . 主执行帧将继续运行，直至 关闭。The main execution frame will continue until the is shutdown.

summary.span: 当 完成关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the finishes shutting down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动 的关闭进程时，将引发 事件，并将 设置为 `true`。When the shutdown process of a is started, the event is raised and is set to `true`. 在事件队列展开之前， 不会完全关闭。The does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds. 当调度程序完成关闭时，将引发 事件，并且 属性设置为 "`true`"。When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the event is raised and the property is set to `true`. 关闭进程开始后，将中止队列中所有挂起的工作项。Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.

summary.span: 在通过 或 执行委托的过程中，如果引发线程异常且未能捕获该异常，则发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 或 未捕获到委托执行期间引发的异常，则会引发此事件。This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of or is uncaught. 处理程序可以将异常标记为已处理，这将阻止调用内部异常处理程序。A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called. 必须谨慎编写此事件的事件处理程序，以避免创建辅助异常并捕获发生的任何异常。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议避免在处理程序中分配内存或执行任何资源密集型操作。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了不引发 事件的方法。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先引发 事件，如果 上的 设置为 `false`，则不会引发 事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

span.span: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of or when in the filter stage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在筛选阶段期间引发异常，该异常在委托执行过程中通过 或 方式引发，未捕获。This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of or and is uncaught. 此时不展开调用堆栈（第一次出现异常）。The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception). 必须谨慎编写此事件的事件处理程序，以避免创建辅助异常并捕获发生的任何异常。Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur. 建议避免在处理程序中分配内存或执行任何资源密集型操作。It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler. 事件提供了不引发 事件的方法。The event provides a means to not raise the event. 首先引发 事件，如果 上的 设置为 `false`，则不会引发 事件。The event is raised first, and If on the is set to `false`, the event will not be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在其上创建 线程可以访问 。Only the thread the is created on may access the . 此方法是公共的;因此，任何线程都可以检查它是否有权访问 。This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the . 和 之间的区别在于，如果调用线程不能访问 并且 引发异常，则 会返回一个布尔值。The difference between and is returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来确定线程是否有权访问在其上创建了 的线程。The following example uses to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a was created on. 方法采用对象作为参数，该参数强制转换为 。The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a . 将调用 的 的 方法来验证对线程的访问。The method on the of the is called to verify access to the thread. 如果调用线程具有对 的访问权限，则只需访问 的成员即可更新 。If the calling thread has access to the , the is updated by just accessing the members of the . 如果调用线程没有访问权限，则会引发 。If the calling thread does not have access, an is thrown. 此示例捕获异常并将接受 作为参数的委托推送到 的 上。This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a as an argument, onto the of the . 此 将执行更新 的操作。This will do the work of updating the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法，用于将执行控制临时发布到当前调度程序，以便它可以执行其他工作，如处理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 在返回值上使用 `await`或 `Await` Visual Basic，运算符，以将控制权返回给当前调度程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 如果希望应用程序在 UI 线程上执行大量工作时能够处理事件，则可使用此方法。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，可以在更新控件的长时间运行的循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control. 此方法等效于调用 方法并传入 。This method is equivalent to calling the method and passing in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法，用于将执行控制临时发布到当前调度程序，以便它可以执行其他工作，如处理其他事件。This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events. 在返回值上使用 `await`或 `Await` Visual Basic，运算符，以将控制权返回给当前调度程序。Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher. 如果希望应用程序在 UI 线程上执行大量工作时能够处理事件，则可使用此方法。Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread. 例如，可以在更新控件的长时间运行的循环中使用此方法。For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
